                     java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String type,
                     float price,
                     java.lang.String color,
                     boolean inCatalog,
                     java.lang.String imageURL,
                     byte[] byteArr)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: IProductController
        A function that gets all data as parameters, and creates a Product instance with all associated data.
        Specified by:
        parse in interface IProductController
        Parameters:
        prdID - - Product ID
        name - - Product name
        type - - Product type(4 types)
        price - - Product price
        color - - Product color
        inCatalog - - if the product is a catalog item
        imageURL - - Product image URL
        byteArr - - Product image parse into bytes
        Returns:
        new Product instance with all the required data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Can be thrown when updating if update fails

                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: ParentController
        Converting individual data (each Object in obj) to Object. Each Controller in ZerLi_Server will implement it.
        Specified by:
        handleGet in interface IProductController
        Specified by:
        handleGet in class ParentController
        Parameters:
        obj - is array list that contains the "cells" of the Result (By ResultSet) from the Data Base
        Returns:
        ArrayList of the parsed data that asked to SELECT
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This function uses parse that can throw an exception

      • add

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> add(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> arr)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: ParentController
        Will add the object to the DataBase
        Specified by:
        add in interface IProductController
        Specified by:
        add in class ParentController
        Parameters:
        arr - always will contain 2 Objects: The first one (get(0)) is the Object to add to the DataBase (Depend on the Controller) The second one (get(1)) is Boolean that indicates if we want to get the new Object's id
        Returns:
        ArrayList that contains the answer: if the Boolean=true, will contain the BigInteger id else, will contain true
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the Exception can be throwed in 2 situations, if there is a problem with the query that sent to the DB. or if the returned values is not from the type we expected.
